name: borland.vim
summary: Classic borland IDE like Vim color scheme
install_details:
1. Copy the borland.vim script to the .vim/colors directory. Refer to
   ':help colorscheme', ':help syn-default-override' and ':help runtimepath'
   for more details
2. Use the ":colorscheme borland" command to use the color scheme.  You
   can add this command to the .vimrc or .gvimrc file also.
